title: Where to Find Diamond in Blox Fruits: Boss Location & Defeating Tips

steps.title: Go to Flower Hill in the Kingdom of Rose in the Second Sea.
steps.content: Go to Flower Hill in the Kingdom of Rose in the Second Sea. Diamond is a level 750 Boss you can only find in the Second Sea. He's located on a hill, the top of which is covered in flowers.

steps.title: Use ranged attacks.
steps.content: Use ranged attacks. Since Diamond is a melee boss, he can't hurt you if he can't get to you. So stay at range to avoid any damage from Diamond.

steps.title: Venom or Magma Fruits easily defeat Diamond.
steps.content: Venom or Magma Fruits easily defeat Diamond. Venom is ranged and puts a damage-over-time tick on the Boss, so he takes damage steadily and persistently. [1] X Research source Magma makes you immune to physical damage (unless you're below level 750) and creates a similar effect to Venom, leaving a damage-per-second tick on the Boss. [2] X Research source The drop chance for his sword is pretty low, so you'll probably end up defeating this boss a few times before you get it. It's a longsword, even though Diamond looks like he's wielding a cutlass.
